title: Brothers Grimm, The [2005 PAL DVD][En Subs[Nordic]
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0355295/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0355295/</a>

5,9




Set in the early 19th century (in French-occupied Germany!) Will Grimm (Damon) and Jake Grimm (Ledger) are siblings who travel the countryside as snake-oil salesmen, convincing unsuspecting towns that they are haunted and agreeing to get rid of the demons; all for a price of course. In the meantime they set their tales down in writing, creating a wealth of oddball, offbeat, and frightening characters. But after they are caught by General Delatombe (Pryce) and his sidekick Cavaldi (Stormare), they are sent to the tiny village of Marbaden to solve the mysterious disappearance of a number of young girls, placing them in the middle of a fantasy world unlike any they'd ever invented...



Director Terry Gilliam
Certificate 12 years and over
Year 2005
Screen Widescreen 1.85:1 Anamorphic
Languages English - Dolby Digital (5.1)
Subtitles Nordic
Duration 1 hour and 55 minutes (approx)
Region Region 2

Audio commentary

Actors
